attributes.action: Provide better systems in which our government helpsthe homeless & impoverished
attributes.additional_details:
Studies on homelessness in the U.K. :

http://www.homeless.org.uk/facts/homelessness-in-numbers

This link provides numbers on families that have become homeless and individuals of any age and gender.
attributes.background: Our society is failing first and foremost to the people that live in it. The increase in homelessness in the UK cannot and should not be ignored. Provide large boarding facilities providing, help with addiction and giving the residence skills sets e.g.; culinary, construction, literacy..

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

It is clear you care about people who are homeless. You may wish to sign this petition: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/161567
